title: 你们都是怎么找服务器的

replies.author: LRual
replies.txt_content: 在QQ上群搜索

replies.author: s2450410280
replies.txt_content: mcbbs上找啊

replies.author: z123w100
replies.txt_content: 上网查，最直接

replies.author: AshLikeSnowALS
replies.txt_content: 用mcbbs或者贴吧吧 要么就问问以前一起玩mc的朋友

replies.author: iuu回归
replies.txt_content: 网上搜，论坛看，问人。中文服优先

replies.author: 迷の小明
replies.txt_content: 当然是选择在MCbbs呀【原谅绿】

replies.author: 天空的大楼
replies.txt_content: 我都上服务器板块找（虽然现在没找到）。
当然是mcbbs啦，抱大腿

replies.author: lackboat
replies.txt_content: 找服务器就在mcbbs里面找阿

replies.author: 惜hh
replies.txt_content: 我是在mcbbs里面找的，或者直接问度娘

replies.author: 南歌_未央_
replies.txt_content: 有朋友推荐啊，上论坛呀

replies.author: 庐山雨
replies.txt_content: 去服务器板块啊每天都有人发服务器贴

replies.author: ★遨游の星空★
replies.txt_content: 朋友多的话直接找人介绍就好了啊，毕竟都是一起玩过的朋友，喜欢的服务器的类型也是相差不多的

replies.author: 梦戟殇牵挂
replies.txt_content: MCBBS呢 这里没有那么乱

replies.author: ir-0
replies.txt_content: 直接百度

replies.author: Aozoras
replies.txt_content: MCBBS 啊 朋友介绍啊

replies.author: 神乐坂优树
replies.txt_content: 就是这里啊

replies.author: TNT嘉音
replies.txt_content: 在贴吧和论坛找。

replies.author: hhehhehhe
replies.txt_content: 直接MCBBS

replies.author: Shan_Ya_77
replies.txt_content: mcbbs吧..

replies.author: 若瞳①号
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 二哈大魔王
replies.txt_content: ...在这调查好像无用啊。。 就好像你在QQ 问别人 你用什么聊天工具一样。。。

replies.author: 假的混.乱
replies.txt_content: 贴吧，各mc论坛~
